title: Matteo Lignani
text:
Matteo Lignani (born September 7, 1991) is an Italian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for <a href="S.C.%20Trestina%20A.S.D.">Trestina</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> debut for <a href="A.S.%20Livorno%20Calcio">Livorno</a> on May 9, 2010 in a game against <a href="S.S.%20Lazio">Lazio</a> when he came on as a substitute in the 87th minute for <a href="Davide%20Moro">Davide Moro</a>.
On 5 September 2012, he joined <a href="CFR%20Cluj">CFR Cluj</a> on loan.
